ingredients: 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon zest, 2  eggs, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1   +   3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 cup powdered sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 7%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 106mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 20g 7%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 21mg 0%
